223442851.body:
(Part One) My current swing stocks I am holding through the weekend (9 total stocks). See my other post for my other swing holdings.

$AMPE -Sold today at .679 from .555 from Wednesday. Also bought back in at .64 (Thinking this has more room to run here)
$NOVN -Bought Thursday at .485 (holding out for the next pop here)
$CAPR -Bought Tuesday at 4.94 (nice uptrend being established here. Could explode at a moments notice like it did in April)
$HEXO -Bought back in Tuesday at .80 after swinging it from .75 to .85 (This ones hurting a bit. I think it will come back but will cut it if it drops a bit lower to preserve capital)
$QLGN -Bought last Wednesday at 4.92 (Dropped below 4.50 today which isn't good but I am holding out until at least Monday to see what happens)

223405139.body: $HEXO anybody else see the cup and handle on the 4 hour chart mmmmmmm guys I’m touching my nipple bullish channel breakout with some support from the indexes and we’ll be looking good

223390498.body: $HEXO this was not a “sell off”. Volume was half the avg. basically we didn’t have the buyers but some sold, good riddance. Shit happens. We remain

223380667.body: $HEXO I will said Hexo show good earnings, company is solid. However, THE CEO that dude is a dirtbag and looking to load his pockets fast. GL and enjoy the weekend. Hopefully, this greedy scumbag does not unload ATM offer share on Monday. Shareholders need a break

223373185.body: $HEXO please can we get a split thats all we need

223359845.body:
$HEXO  summer of 2019 was shyte for Hexo with 3 PRs and bad ERs, but where have ERs gone since then?

June 2020 has too many positive PRs to count, and the ER call hint at JV "surprises" will likely come late summer or early fall, plus RTD CBD and THC coming even sooner.

Just look at these satellite images from 2018-2019 and from 2020 and tell me that Hexo's Belleville facility is not cooking up something special very very soon.
